name: Five Nights At Shrek's
description:
Five Nights At Shrek's is a creative take on the FNaF genre.

Featuring popular characters like Homer Simpson and internet celebrities such as IShowSpeed, this game is a must play.  With an unsettling atmosphere, some fun minigames between nights, and a deep and lore rich secret ending, there's hours of terror and fun to be had playing this marvellous game despite it's lack of any original characters.
